headline: VIDEO: Debate erupts into chaos as Republican compares Dem to ‘dumber’ AOC
author: DML News App
sentences:
Don’t you suck up to him.”
The second Josh Mandel v. Morgan Harper debate is going completely off the rails pic.twitter.com/DtZJZxmK40
— Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022
Promoted Content
Mandel is just openly insulting Harper at this debate, to groans pic.twitter.com/YANuVOJn9X
— Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022
After a debate in which Mandel called Harper dumb and scolded her for being “angry” about a dozen times, Harper refuses to shake his hand pic.twitter.com/yTuvfYDGzm
— Tyler Buchanan (@Tylerjoelb) February 22, 2022
The full debate is in the video below:
Harper posted a video message on Tuesday, blasting Mandel, calling him a sexist and a racist.

As the most reliable and balanced news aggregation service on the internet, DML News App offers the following information published by Fox News:
An Ohio Senate debate between Republican candidate Josh Mandel and Democrat Morgan Harper devolved into name-calling and sparring with the audience Monday night, adding the latest explosive moment to the incendiary Ohio Senate race.

‘You’re actually dumber than AOC.’
‘Why are you so angry?’
Donate to my campaign to keep Josh Mandel’s hateful, sexist and racist rhetoric out of the Senate.https://t.co/RxdXFeviiB pic.twitter.com/egt7ImPlpy
— Morgan Harper (@mh4oh) February 22, 2022
CANTON, OH — Proud to have the endorsement of General Michael Flynn — The People’s General!

Promoted Content
Among the insults, Mandel said Harper is “like AOC only dumber,” referring to Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, D-N.Y. And Harper mocked Mandel for being on his third run for U.S. Senate, with unsuccessful efforts in 2012 and 2018.

Promoted Content
Mandel was asked about a previous comment he had made, when he called Black Lives Matter “thugs.” That set off one member of the audience, who yelled, “You ain’t coming in the Black community.

There are thousands of veterans living under bridges and they must be our priority.”
Facebook’s Ministry of Truth suspended me for saying we should put American military veterans ahead of illegal immigrants.

pic.twitter.com/FVDlo18N10
— Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) February 20, 2022
Meanwhile, Facebook temporarily suspended Mandel for a post he made saying US veterans should take priority over illegal aliens.

The article goes on to state the following:
Mandel is the former treasurer of Ohio and one of several leading Republican candidates running to succeed retiring GOP Sen.

Facebook claimed the remark was “hate speech.”
Mandel had written, “Illegal immigrants should be deported – not supported with American tax dollars.
These ungrateful elites have no appreciation that their freedom exists ONLY because American servicemen stand watch in dark places across the globe.

pic.twitter.com/6zG0ubtqf1
— Josh Mandel (@JoshMandelOhio) February 21, 2022
To get more information about this article, please visit Fox News.
Harper is a long shot Democrat in a primary against longtime Rep. Tim Ryan, who’s considered the clear front-runner in the Democratic primary.
And if you have the DML NEWS APP, please tell people to download it today and help conservatives have a real voice.
The report notes that the nastiest exchange happened between Mandel, an audience member and the moderator.

Don’t embarrass me.”
The audience member, a Black woman, fired back, “I’m not embarrassing you.

Put ’em out.”
The moderator, who was black, said, “Hey sister, listen to me.
But to bring that White man in the Black community like that, I’m finished.
The debate Monday included only Harper and Mandel.
